description:
I could see that the policy.json file for nova has been removed for stable/ocata branch, but the documentation still refers for modifications of file incase a user wants to control the access.

Below are the wordings:

"By default, administrative users can configure the flavors. You can change this behavior by redefining the access controls for compute_extension:flavormanage in /etc/nova/policy.json on the compute-api server."

Link to the document:

https://docs.openstack.org/admin-guide/compute-images-instances.html
title: Policy.json for nova is removed in stable/ocata but the documentation still refers to editing the file for controlling actions
